| HistoryText             = The Titanic Three was a trio of supervillains—[[Boris Bullski (Earth-616)|Titanium Man]], [[Alexander Nevsky (Earth-616)|Crimson Dynamo]], and [[Chen Lu (Earth-616)|Radioactive Man]]—who, tired of acting as lapdogs to the Russian and Chinese governments, went rogue and made a deal with the Communist government of [[Vietnam]] to act as enforcers.{{r|Avengers #130}}
